title: Creating an Equation
text: Supplementary angles add to 180, so we have $$x+y=180$$. We also know that $$-x+4y=5$$ from the problem.

title: Elimination
text: Let us add the equations to eliminaite x. $$5y=185$$

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$y=\frac{185}{5}=37$$. Plugging y back in, we get $$x=180-37=143$$.
